column5: OK - who is all gonna be there?? - If there are a few - lets meet and grab a brew!!??  Later  Greg
Do you need your hunting license for the course? I am thinking of doing my PAL in April so I would like to know before I do.  Thanks, Rob C
I'm doing it with my sister in law(almost) and a buddy, but we're registered for the 25th............
I'll be at the one in London April 14th.
Hey RobC,I just saw that you don't need a hunting lic. to take the course......hope this helps.......tight lines....Chuck........
what are the season's for hunting turkey...curious seen about 20-30 in a field on the way home this morning!
Thanks Chev, I am probably going to sign up for it then.   Rob C

Charlie the season is pretty much the month of May.  The 20-30 you see in a group now is probably a winter flock.  They will likely be in the same general area but smaller groups once the season starts.  I'm hoping to get my first bird this year, I only got out twice last year and didnt even see a bird!!
I don't hunt anything but was just wondering cause I seen so many in one area.  Is it expensive to get a licence and stuff!
DAMM Im definately going to purchase a vest now  THERE ARE NO WILD TURKEY IN ONTARIO  DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON A COURSE GO TO THE STORE AND BUY ONE!!!!!
BITEME.....................................LOL   Dont forget,they here today but gone 2morrow.LOL
